DOC.brief_summary: This study compare electroacupuncture mirabegron treatment overactive bladder ( OAB ) symptom woman fail treatment anticholingeric therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Electroacupuncture Mirabegron Treatment Overactive Bladder
DOC.detailed_description: Screening/Eligibility Visit : If determine patient diagnosis OAB fail therapy least one anti-cholinergic agent , potential participant screen eligibility confirm study investigator . A signed , IRB-approved inform consent obtain . Randomization : Randomization perform patient agree participate discuss sign informed consent form . Patients randomized random block 4 , 6 8 either acupuncture group mirabegron group . Once patient participation confirm , envelop mark study participant number open one study investigator front patient . Acupuncture Protocol : All acupuncture session perform licensed acupuncturist employ University Hospitals Connor Integrative Health Network . All acupuncturists involve study protocol train supervised correct technique Christine Kaiser , MS , LAc , Dipl.OM . Acupuncture session perform weekly 6 week schedule accommodate patient 's acupuncturists ' schedule . Acupuncture session last 30 minute . Selected point include kidney 3 , kidney 6 , spleen 6 , ren 4 . The current delivery electroacupuncture approximately 10-20 mA ( adjust patient sensation ) delivery 10 Hz 30 minute per session . After completion 6 week treatment patient contact phone 2 week interval determine duration symptomatic relief cessation treatment.. Mirabegron Protocol : Patients assigned medication group prescribe 50 mg myrbetriq daily take 6 week . At completion study , patient satisfy effect mirabegron may continue use discretion .
DOC.criteria: Patients must 18 year old well willing able provide inform consent Patients document symptom overactive bladder include : urgency , frequency > 7 time per day , nocturia , urgency incontinence least 6 month Patients fail least one anticholinergic medication define change unsatisfactory improvement symptom severity 6 week daily regimen Patients young 18 year , Patients unable unwilling provide inform consent , Patients illiterate , Patients nonEnglish speaking reading , Patients current urinary tract infection Patients history interstitial cystitis Patients history bleed disorder Patients currently chronic anticoagulation Patients take mirabegron past currently use Patients currently undergo acupuncture treatment different condition Patients currently undergo pelvic floor physical therapy Patients currently undergo undergo treatment urologic gynecologic malignancy Patients currently pregnant Patients implant pacemaker AICD Patients history uncontrolled poorly control hypertension
